message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Your turn!
You're starting strong, let's see if you can keep it up!
That's a bit too aggressive, Bob. I'm not going to give up 80% of the remaining money so easily.

You're getting closer to my target, but I'm not there yet!

You're getting desperate, but I'm not giving up yet!

I'm being realistic, Bob. Let's split the remaining money in a way that's fair considering the current value of the money.
You're getting close to my target, but I'm not willing to give up now!

You're getting close to the end, but I'm still not satisfied!

Fine, Bob. I'd rather walk away with nothing than give you 99% of the remaining money. It's a shame we couldn't come to a better agreement.
